messages.title: Simon Kirby: My priorities for Peacehaven, East Saltdean & Telscombe Cliffs
messages.content: For a strong and effective MP who will work hard to serve you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Simon Kirby supported the campaign to secure the future of the Royal Sussex County Hospital.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Action on traffic chaos and road repairs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raised issues with traffic and road repairs. Worked to secure £30 million for A27 improvements and resurfacing of local roads.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Help the CIC to reopen Saltdean Lido
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Obtained £49.7 million funding towards the restoration of Saltdean Lido to benefit the community.

issues.health: Simon Kirby supported the campaign to secure the future of the Royal Sussex County Hospital.

housing.content: Obtained £49.7 million funding towards the restoration of Saltdean Lido to benefit the community.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am someone who listens and takes action. I am not a career politician; I have been working hard over the last 6 years as an effective local MP, and I know what I am doing.

politicalExperience.achievements: Securing future of the Royal Sussex County Hospital, obtaining £49.7 million funding for Saltdean Lido, delivering A27 improvements.
